entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -24.6°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or periods of drizzle overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Blowing snow late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 in the evening then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
